mapper.insert: insert into users (username, name, birthday, phone_number, password, gender) values (#{username}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{phone_number}, #{password}, #{gender})
mapper.select: SELECT u.username, u.password, u.enabled, a.authority FROM users u LEFT JOIN authorities a ON u.username = a.username WHERE u.username = #{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET name = #{name}, phone_number = #{phone_number}, gender = #{gender}, birthday = TO_DATE(#{birthday}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE username = #{username}
